title: Handle Rejected E-file (SSN Mismatch)
description: A taxpayer's e-filed return was rejected because a dependent's Social Security Number and last name do not match IRS records.

tasks.description: Identify the rejection code from the e-file system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the specific code indicating a dependent SSN/name mismatch.

tasks.description: Verify the dependent's name and SSN with the taxpayer, checking against the Social Security card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent discovers a typo was made when entering the dependent's last name.

tasks.description: Correct the information in the tax return and re-transmit the e-file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully corrects the error and resubmits the return.
